definition: a piece of information about circumstances that exist or events that have occurred
details:
noun
- a piece of information about circumstances that exist or events that have occurred
= example: a piece of information about circumstances that exist or events that have occurred
- a concept whose truth can be proved
= example: a concept whose truth can be proved
- a statement or assertion of verified information about something that is the case or has happened
= example: a statement or assertion of verified information about something that is the case or has happened
- an event known to have happened or something known to have existed
= example: an event known to have happened or something known to have existed
